content: शूर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [शूर्-अच्] Brave, heroic, valiant, mighty; शून्येषु शूरा न के <ls>K. P. 7.</ls> --रः {@--1@} A hero, warrior, valiant man. {@--2@} A lion. {@--3@} A boar. {@--4@} The sun. {@--5@} The Śāla tree. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Yādava, the grandfather of Kṛṣṇa. {@--7@} The Arka plant. {@--8@} The Citraka tree.
